content.description: This is a two move wonder. Start with your hands on the two obvious jugs and shuffle your feet into the bat hang. Once in the bat hang, match hands and get your left hand on the small crimp. After adjusting your feet, throw to the jug and top out.
content.location: Right Next to the Chicano Traverse.

content.description: Start with your right hand on the semi good crimp and left on the unique undercling/pinch. Move out your left hand left to the semi good sloper and then fall into the slippery jug. Move out left again to the obvious hold on the arete and then match. Adjust your feet and go out left to the protruding hold and get a high foot. I used a drop knee to make it to the next hold and then finally throw out to the the arete on the far left of the boulder. Top out. (Stay below 5ft the entire traverse. Avoid the massive jugs even though they are tempting.
content.location: On the South side of the creek, you can hop across boulders. Somewhat hidden and you can't see from the parking lot. Follow the location on the map.
